entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:42 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:42 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
